value.text: MEXICO CITY (AP) — Mexico’s Supreme Court decriminalizes abortion nationwide.

record.text: If you're not a secretary of state or otherwise have obvious standing, better to argue "I will not decide my vote before the election, but if he's not qualified and if I did decide to vote for him and it did turn out he is ineligible, my vote would be pointless, so his inclusion is a harm to me"
Hmmm. Let's see how this goes.

value.text: Today, a group of voters in Colorado filed a lawsuit to prevent Trump from being on the 2024 ballot, arguing that he is disqualified from running under Sec. 3 of the 14th Amendment. Read the suit, from @katherinepomps.bsky.social.

external.title: Colorado Residents File Suit to Disqualify Trump from 2024 Election
external.description: The petitioners argue that Trump should be disqualified from public office under Section 3 of the Fourteenth Amendment.

external.title: Colorado Residents File Suit to Disqualify Trump from 2024 Election
external.description: The petitioners argue that Trump should be disqualified from public office under Section 3 of the Fourteenth Amendment.

images.alt: Trump is on the ballot, voters who would otherwise vote for Petitioners' candidates of choice will instead vote for Trump, reducing the likelihood that Petitioners' candidates of choice will win the election

Trump is on the ballot, voters who would otherwise vote for Petitioners' candidates of choice will instead vote for Trump, reducing the likelihood that Petitioners' candidates of choice will win the election

record.text: Literally every point in what Elon calls an "accurate analysis" is false, misleading, or totally out of context if you watch the full video. Once again, Elon may be the dumbest person on this planet.

images.alt:
Elon quote tweeting Mario Nawfal. Elon's tweet says: "Accurate analysis."

Mario's tweet: BREAKING: DEBUNKING THE LIES IN ADL'S RESPONSE TO ELON

ADL's CEO broke his silence on 𝕏 and Elon by lying and trapping the host:

1) He claimed that Elon brought and amplified anti-semitism and hate speech back to the platform. 

This is NOT TRUE. The 𝕏 Safety team shared that an independent assessment by Sprinklr found that hate speech impressions on 𝕏 “to be 0.003% compared to Twitter’s estimate of 0.012%.”

2) Greenblatt clarified that he has never claimed Elon or 𝕏 are anti-Semitic: “I don’t think Twitter as a platform is anti-Semitic.”

3) When Greenblatt was asked by the host (who also identified as Jewish) if he was seeking a position or donation from 𝕏 to the ADL, he took offense to this, called it an anti-semetic trope, almost as if he was trying to cancel him, leaving the host uncomfortable and defensive.

4) Greenblatt claimed ADL is NOT publicly or privately talking to advertiser

Elon quote tweeting Mario Nawfal. Elon's tweet says: "Accurate analysis."

Mario's tweet: BREAKING: DEBUNKING THE LIES IN ADL'S RESPONSE TO ELON

ADL's CEO broke his silence on 𝕏 and Elon by lying and trapping the host:

1) He claimed that Elon brought and amplified anti-semitism and hate speech back to the platform. 

This is NOT TRUE. The 𝕏 Safety team shared that an independent assessment by Sprinklr found that hate speech impressions on 𝕏 “to be 0.003% compared to Twitter’s estimate of 0.012%.”

2) Greenblatt clarified that he has never claimed Elon or 𝕏 are anti-Semitic: “I don’t think Twitter as a platform is anti-Semitic.”

3) When Greenblatt was asked by the host (who also identified as Jewish) if he was seeking a position or donation from 𝕏 to the ADL, he took offense to this, called it an anti-semetic trope, almost as if he was trying to cancel him, leaving the host uncomfortable and defensive.

4) Greenblatt claimed ADL is NOT publicly or privately talking to advertiser

record.text: Yeah - he IS extremely dumb, but it's also looking like Greenblatt has no ability to actually fight him, so there's at least a second challenger here.
I love masking. No one gets to tell me to smile more or see my fucked up teeth AND it helps me avoid getting sick? Hell yeah, sign me up

value.text:
I've been holding on to X mostly because posting to it is literally in my job description. 

However, after the blatant display of antisemitism from Musk yesterday, I feel complicit hanging around there. 

With that, I'll be putting more effort into this app. I'm sorry it took me this long.
